tika dawasakata kalin man kathandarayak kiwwane man honda wenna balana kenek kiyala man kalekata issara kiyapu prakashayak passe dawasaka mage waradakin mawa berapu hati gana.menna thawath honda wenna balana porak gana, man ahala thiyena, kathandarayak.me kiyana pora giyalu demawpiyo ekka manamaliyek balanna.ithin kattiya sathutu samichiye inna welawe manamali wenna inna kellage thaththa manamala pora gana prashna ahanna patan gaththalu."me lamaya sigarat hema bonawada?""apo na.""bonnema nadda?""danne nadda indala hitala ekak bonawa.""ee kiwwe?""danne nadda oya drink ekak dana dawasata hema.""ee kiyanne nitharama arakku bonawada?""apo na.""bonnema nadda?""danne nadda indala hitala drink ekak danawa.""ee kiwwe?""danne nadda oya yaluwo ekka bar ekakata giyoth hema.""ee kiyanne nitharama yaluwo ekka bonna bar ekata yanawada?""apo na.""ee kiwwe?""danne nadda oya indala hitala assayek wada karapu dawasata witharayi yaluwo ekka bar ekata yanne."ithin eda "wenda manamalayage" parshawaye kattiya "wenda manamalige" gedarin ehen pitathwela thamange gedarata ena kota eheta teligram ekak awillalu, "wenda manamalige" thaththagen."ape diyaniya pilibanda wiwaha yojanawa itu kala nohaka.
